name: Orange Marmalade: Haikyuu Otome Game
description:
For Macintosh or Apple users Please copy and paste this website on safari to download the game! Chrome does not support this file! 

Good Morning Everyone!

 Welcome to my very first new fan-made otome game! Featuring Hinata Shoyo from Haikyu!! I spent a total of 2 months planning, designing, illustrating, writing a script, and coding to build this game. I am a one-man team but I enjoy the challenge.  I was actually in and out when I was trying to build the game due to my school schedule but I managed to pull through with hard work and determination.

This story is just part one. In part 2, We will create more scenes as well as a longer storyline.

I only have a few simple rules and words for all my gamers:

  1. The game is free to play and for personal use only so you can download and play the game for free.
  2. But If you would like to post a game through video or any type of video on youtube or on twitch or to stream please buy one coffee from my Ko‑fi account or donate any amount here :).

(This is to support me in creating more games like these in the future).

https://ko-fi.com/mionharune

*Help me spread this game to every haikyuu!! Fans by posting a selfie with the start page and use the hashtag #orangemarmalade, #hinatashoyootomegame, or #haikyuuotomegame. All promotions in TikTok are also greatly appreciated but please DO NOT spoil the game!

*Also, for every gamer please don’t hesitate to tag me whether it's on Instagram, youtube or TikTok because I would like to make a special thanks for all players by the end of the year! (Instagram: @mion.harune or @mioncreations) (Tiktok: Mion Harune)

Also, I would like your input to which anime character I should make an otome game next! Should I continue on with more Haikyuu characters? or move on into a different anime?
